description:
To counter Amane`s plans of attending the ...toile election Miyuki makes Tamao and Nagisa an offer not to be refused: enter the game together and repeat Miator`s victorious history. Both Nagisa and Shizuma end up in an internal conflict as to how they truly feel. Tragedy strikes when Amane falls off her horse just as she is about to tell Hikari about her feelings.
Source: crunchyroll
